name: When you're at sea you fight pirates!!!
text: Main Look at the top 3 cards of your deck, reveal up to 1 <Straw Hat Crew>, <Kid Pirates> or <Heart Pirates> type card and add it to your hand. Then, place the remaining cards at the bottom of your deck in any order.
